entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle and showers this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle and rain showers changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
